ch the

en by

s would be a valuable contribution. Of course, for

omains the number of domain-segments that reflect 
> "same domain" (in a me=
aningful shared-ownership sense) varies.

> - Gordon @ IA

I=

urable - but it seems to me like this isn't an available option.
